name: 洪媽益
objective:
本課程將帶領學生學習英文文法、型態、及段落的基本技巧。學生可以運用這些技巧來寫出關於新聞及網路時事的短評。學生在本課程中需要寫出多種英文句型正確的語句以及各種類型的短評，如其他國家、全球化、商業、政治等。學生可以運用這些技巧而獨立寫出任何主題的英文文章。
In this course students will be introduced to fundamental rules of English grammar, style, and paragraphing; students will apply those skills to short writings about current events in the news and from the internet. The course will require students to write a variety of syntactically sound English sentences and types of paragraphs about other countries, globalism, business, politics, and so on. These skills will then be useful for the student to be able independently to produce English prose on any subject.
